Package com.atakmap.android.cot

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MarkerDetailHandler
    Responsible for implementing any marker to detail conversions.
    UIDHandler.AttributeInjector
    Used to inject Attributes into the UIDHandler for third party plugins.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CotMapAdapter  
    CotMapComponent
    Per-MapItem properties * entry - always "CoT"
    CotMapServerListener  
    CotMarkerRefresher
    Listens for self-produced CoT entry MapItems and installs listeners to maintain an send changes
    CotModificationManager
    Replace a current tight coupling within ATAK that allows for specialized behavior to occur when a MapItem is received and requires a user action before it can continue.
    CotModificationManager.ModificationAction  
    CotUtils  
    ExternalGPSInput
    This thread will provide an entry point to receive and process externally supplied GPS data.
    NetworkGPSPreferenceFragment

    UID detail
